Name: Emotion and Development Branch Phenotyping and DTI (2012-2017)
Acknowledgements: This research was supported by the NIMH Intramural Research Program.
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite this dataset using the appropriate OpenNeuro DOI.
EthicsApprovals: NIH Clinical Study Protocols NCT02531893 (Psychological Treatments for Youth With Severe Irritability) and NCT00025935 (Studies of Brain Function and Course of Illness in Pediatric Bipolar Disorder).
ReferencesAndLinks: For additional information about this dataset and associated code, please refer to our study GitHub repository: https://github.com/nimh-dsst/DTI-Phenotyping
